org.universAAL.ucc.configuration.api

Class ConfigPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.universAAL.ucc.configuration.api.ConfigPreferences
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StorageChangedListener

    public class ConfigPreferences
extends Object
implements StorageChangedListener
    This configuration preferences class loads the configuration instance for the given bundle from the configuration instances storage. It could be asked for a configuration option value by the id of this configuration option.
    Author:
    Sebastian.Schoebinge

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigPreferences(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle)
      Get the storage service and add the current instance as change listener.
